name: Leaflet.coordinates
tagline: Leaflet plugin to view mouse coordinates
body:
Leaflet.Coordinates =================== ### What is this? Leaflet plugin to view mouse coordinates. Also the user can change the coordinates and get a marker on that position. *Tested with Leaflet 0.5* ### Demo anyone? ToDo ### How to use? ```javascript L.control.coordinates({ position:"bottomleft", //optional default "bootomright" decimals:2, //optional default 4 decimalSeperator:".", //optional default "." labelTemplateLat:"Latitude: {y}", //optional default "Lat: {y}" labelTemplateLng:"Longitude: {x}"" //optional default "Lng: {x}", enableUserInput:true //optional default true }).addTo(map); ``` ### Releases none yet ### License
